content: This article's lead section **may need to be rewritten**. Please review the lead guide and help improve the lead of this article if you can. *(January 2026)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Turkish company **Insider One** is a Turkish artificial intelligence company based in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). Founded in 2012 in [Istanbul](/wiki/Istanbul), the [SaaS](/wiki/Software_as_a_service) company is one of Turkey's first [unicorn](/wiki/Unicorn_(finance)) firms, and is led by CEO Hande Çilingir. ## History Insider One was founded in Istanbul in 2012 by Arda Koterin, Hande Cilingir, Mehmet Sinan Toktay, Muharrem Derinkök, Okan Yedibela, and Serhat Soyuerel. Between February 2021 and May 2023, the company raised 2 billion dollars in several funding rounds, 105 million of which came from the [Qatar Investment Authority](/wiki/Qatar_Investment_Authority) and Esas Private Equity. In January 2023, Insider One acquired MindBehind. In December 2025, Insider has rebranded as Insider One. - Official website This software company article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Insider One
